extension.name: Public Mailings Archive (Joinery fork)
extension.description: Creates a page with a list of mailings enabled for public pages. Each item will link to it's own public page. The list can be filtered by the message template ID and by date options. This extension is a fork; see comments.

maintainer.author: Tyrell Cook / tyrell@aghstrategies.com (forked by Allen Shaw)

extension.comments:
This module displays all of the public mailings that have been sent out through civimail. The url to get to the list page is .../civicrm/public_mailings_list.
This extension is a fork of https://github.com/aghstrategies/com.aghstrategies.publicmailings, which is a fork of https://github.com/relldoesphp/com.aghstrategies.publicmailings.
